comment: Love it. Clean design with lots of features. All works. Subtle lighting/shadows are class. No battery life issues. LG G Watch.
title: My daily driver

author: Grant Irons
comment: I love the look of the face and what it can do, but for some reason it kills my battery.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. Normal consumption of battery should be in the range of 2.5-4% per hour. Try restarting your device. In addition, frequent switching screens can greatly drain the battery of your device.

title: Great face, but kills battery

title: Nice looking watch face

author: Kursad Sezgin
comment: Very neat, clean watch. However it's a battery killer! Using it on Smartwatch 3 and I notice a significant change in the battery life.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello, Kursad. Normal battery drain should be located within 2.5-4% per hour. If your device runs out of power quickly, try to restart it and your phone. I am currently working on optimizing this dial. In addition, frequent switching screens and use additional features can greatly accelerate battery drain.
